logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (436100) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (436100) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

All events of Narcolepsy (includes cataplexy with narcolepsy) with no such events in prior clean window period (365 days). No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 1 day.

cohortName: FDA AESI Narcolepsy event episodes for incidence characterization
logicDescription: All events of Narcolepsy (includes cataplexy with narcolepsy). No continuous observation period requirement. Persons exit the cohort on start_date + 365 days.
